caseTitle: Muhammad Mumtaz Khan (decd) thr. LRs & others v. Mst. Siraj Bibi (decd) thr. LRs
tagline: Revenue authorities must exercise care with regard to the land of women. Where revenue officials, through complicity or incompetence, facilitate women being deprived of their land, action should be taken against them, and if the land remains illegally retained, substantial compensatory costs must be imposed.
